actions.command: age_of_exile stat give @s exact attack_speed FLAT origin_aoe1 -5 -5
age_of_exile stat give @s exact armor GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe2 5 5
age_of_exile stat give @s exact health FLAT origin_aoe3 60 60
age_of_exile stat give @s exact health GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe4 10 10
age_of_exile stat give @s exact health_regen GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe5 50 50
age_of_exile stat give @s exact elemental_resist GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe6 7 7

name: 능력치
description:
체력/방어력이 크게 증가하고, 이동속도와 공격속도가 조금 감소합니다.
§f§l특수 능력치 : 총 속성저항 +7%
